function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evaluation of solutions based on cost functions may not account for contagious disease propagation risk.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in the built environment due to lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Incorporate contagious disease transmission models and risk assessment into the evaluation of solutions.","Technologies":"Contagious disease transmission modeling software, risk assessment tools.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, public health officials, urban planners.","Owner":"Public health organizations, urban planning authorities."},{"Description":"Accumulation of answers at a single point of space may lead to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of localized disease outbreaks due to clustering of solutions in the solution space.","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to disperse solutions and reduce accumulation in specific areas of the solution space.","Technologies":"Spatial optimization algorithms, dispersal algorithms.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, public health officials, urban planners.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Random selection of chromosomes from the main population may lead to the propagation of genetic factors related to susceptibility to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of genetic factors associated with susceptibility to contagious diseases spreading within the population.","Mitigation":"Introduce screening mechanisms to identify and mitigate genetic susceptibility factors in the population.","Technologies":"Genetic screening tools, population health databases.","People":"Population of the built environment, public health officials, genetic counselors.","Owner":"Public health organizations, genetic counseling services."}]}
